strapiPost.title: Itâ€™s Game Week for Arkansas Razorbacks Football
strapiPost.content:
Football season is upon us! The Arkansas Razorbacks Football team will kick off the 2023 season against Western Carolina this Saturday, Sep 2, at War Memorial Stadium in Little Rock.

Looking Good: Last week, six Razorback players landed 2023 Preseason Coaches All-SEC distinctions, with Dwight McGlothern and Raheim Sanders making first-team; KJ Jefferson, Brady Latham, and Beaux Limmer on second-team offense; and Cam Little making third-team.

On the Hill: The 2023 season schedule has Razorback fans headed to the state capital for the first game, then Fayetteville will welcome fans to Donald W. Reynolds Stadium on Saturday, Sep 9, when the Hogs host Kent State.

Last week, we hosted a drawing for 2 Season Tickets through our Instagram. Thanks to all who entered, and congrats to our lucky winner, Lauren, on the tickets. Woo pig!
